title: The.Elephant.in.the.Room-Jon.Ronson.epub

From the private Winnebago where conspiracy theorists and fear mongers discuss key campaign decisions, to encounters with the notorious political operative Roger Stone, Ronsonâ€™s journey into Trumpâ€™s world introduces us to a whoâ€™s who of the campaign machine, and discovers what makes them tickâ€”and what ticks them off.

Whimsical, hilarious and often downright terrifying, The Elephant in the Room captures a defining moment in our time as only Jon Ronson could see it
